supplementary-material.label: FIG S7
supplementary-material.p: Conserved residues of RNA-dependent RNA polymerase (RdRp). (a) Sequence logos of the key residues in RdRp catalytic motifs A to C. +ssRNA, positive-sense single-stranded RNA; dsRNA, double-stranded RNA; ns −ssRNA, nonsegmented negative-stranded RNA virus; seg −ssRNA, segmented negative-stranded RNA virus. (b) Sequence alignments depicting the internally permuted of RdRp motifs in negeviruses, permutotetraviruses, and birnaviruses. Download FIG S7, EPS file, 2.8 MB.
